title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl
author: Mohammad Rahmani
name: Highlight Selected Lines
description: Extract the content and stand out specific lines and/or line ranges
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/kookma/TW-Hsl">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/kookma/TW-Hsl"/></$button>

; Highlight Selected Lines (HSL)
This tools is used to highlight selected lines or a range of lines to be standout.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-hsl/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-hsl
